Song.title: Alive
Song.copyright: Music by Steve & Vikki Cook and Joel Sczebel Words by Steve & Vikki Cook © 2011 Sovereign Grace Worship

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [Em | C/E | Em | C/E]
Verse 1: [Em]My heart of stone was dead to [C]You Asleep within a [G]world{,} that [Dsus]scorned its [D]maker [Em]Until You breathed into my [C]soul And I woke up to [G]You,{,} my [Dsus]glorious [D]Savior [Am7]You became my all, [C] You became my all
Chorus: Now [G]I am alive, I [D]am alive in [Am]You [C] [G]You are alive, You [D]are alive in [Am]me [C] You [G]called my name{,} [D] and raised me [Am]from the [C]dead Now [Bm7]I am alive I am[D] alive in [Em]You [Am Em | Cmaj7 Dsus D | Am Em | C]
Verse 2: [Em]In You my life’s completely [C]new I’m blameless in Your [G]eyes{,} be[Dsus]cause of Cal[D]v’ry [Em]The Father welcomes me with [C]joy Your Spirit makes me kn[G]ow{,} Your [Dsus]great love [D]for me [Am7]Jesus, You’re my all,{,} [C] Jesus, You’re my all
Bridge: [Am]Bought with a [Em]price{,} that [C]cannot be [Dsus]mea[D]sured [Am]Chosen be[Em]fore all [C]time [Am]You are my [Em]joy,{,} my [C]prize, and my [Dsus]trea[D]sure [Am]Jesus, You [Em]are my [C]life
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 my heart of stone was dead to you asleep within a world that scorned its maker until you breathed into my soul and i woke up to you my glorious savior you became my all you became my all chorus now i am alive i am alive in you you are alive you are alive in me you called my name and raised me from the dead now i am alive i am alive in you verse 2 in you my lifes completely new im blameless in your eyes because of calvry the father welcomes me with joy your spirit makes me know your great love for me jesus youre my all jesus youre my all bridge bought with a price that cannot be measured chosen before all time you are my joy my prize and my treasure jesus you are my life

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [Em | C/E | Em | C/E]
Verse 1: [Em]My heart of stone was dead to [C]You Asleep within a [G]world{,} that [Dsus]scorned its [D]maker [Em]Until You breathed into my [C]soul And I woke up to [G]You,{,} my [Dsus]glorious [D]Savior [Am7]You became my all, [C] You became my all
Chorus: Now [G]I am alive, I [D]am alive in [Am]You [C] [G]You are alive, You [D]are alive in [Am]me [C] You [G]called my name{,} [D] and raised me [Am]from the [C]dead Now [Bm7]I am alive I am[D] alive in [Em]You [C G Dsus D]
Verse 2: [Em]In You my life’s completely [C]new I’m blameless in Your [G]eyes{,} be[Dsus]cause of Cal[D]v’ry [Em]The Father welcomes me with [C]joy Your Spirit makes me kn[G]ow{,} Your [Dsus]great love [D]for me [Am7]Jesus, You’re my all,{,} [C] Jesus, You’re my all
{new_page} Bridge: [Am]Bought with a [Em]price{,} that [C]cannot be [Dsus]mea[D]sured [Am]Chosen be[Em]fore all [C]time [Am]You are my [Em]joy,{,} my [C]prize, and my [Dsus]trea[D]sure [Am]Jesus, You [Em]are my [C]life
Now [G]I am alive, I [D]am alive in [Am]You [C] [G]You are alive, You [D]are alive in [Am]me [C] You [G]called my name{,} [D] and raised me [Am]from the [C]dead Now [Bm7]I am alive I am[D] alive in [Em]You [Esus]
Now [A]I am alive, I [E]am alive in [Bm]You [D] [A]You are alive, You [E]are alive in [Bm]me [D] You [A]called my name{,} [E] and raised me [Bm]from the [D]dead Now [C#m7]I am alive I am[E] alive in [A]You [E Bm Dsus D]
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 my heart of stone was dead to you asleep within a world that scorned its maker until you breathed into my soul and i woke up to you my glorious savior you became my all you became my all chorus now i am alive i am alive in you you are alive you are alive in me you called my name and raised me from the dead now i am alive i am alive in you verse 2 in you my lifes completely new im blameless in your eyes because of calvry the father welcomes me with joy your spirit makes me know your great love for me jesus youre my all jesus youre my all bridge bought with a price that cannot be measured chosen before all time you are my joy my prize and my treasure jesus you are my life now i am alive i am alive in you you are alive you are alive in me you called my name and raised me from the dead now i am alive i am alive in you now i am alive i am alive in you you are alive you are alive in me you called my name and raised me from the dead now i am alive i am alive in you
